itemPrototypes.name: Long Sword
itemPrototypes.description: A finely crafted long sword with a sharp blade, glinting in the light.

verbs.use: You wield the long sword, ready for battle.
verbs.examine: The sword's blade is etched with ancient runes.

itemPrototypes.name: Magic Book
itemPrototypes.description: An ancient tome filled with arcane knowledge and mystical spells.

verbs.use: You open the magic book and begin to recite a spell.
verbs.examine: The book's pages are filled with magical incantations and diagrams.

itemPrototypes.name: Bow
itemPrototypes.description: A sturdy bow made of fine wood, capable of shooting arrows with great precision.

verbs.use: You take aim with the bow, ready to loose an arrow at your target.
verbs.examine: The wood of the bow is polished to a smooth finish, and the string is taut and strong.

itemPrototypes.name: Leather Armor
itemPrototypes.description: A set of well-crafted leather armor, offering decent protection without sacrificing mobility.

verbs.use: You put on the leather armor, feeling its protective embrace.
verbs.examine: The leather is thick and sturdy, with reinforced stitching at key points.

itemPrototypes.name: Healing Potion
itemPrototypes.description: A small vial containing a red, shimmering liquid that seems to glow with restorative energy.

verbs.use: You drink the healing potion, feeling a warm sensation spread through your body.
verbs.examine: The liquid inside the vial swirls with magical energy.

itemPrototypes.name: Backpack
itemPrototypes.description: A sturdy leather backpack with multiple compartments, perfect for storing various items.

verbs.use: You open the backpack, ready to store or retrieve items.
verbs.examine: The backpack is made of thick leather with reinforced straps and multiple pockets.

itemPrototypes.name: Magic Ring
itemPrototypes.description: A small, intricately carved golden ring that pulses with magical energy.

verbs.use: You slip the ring onto your finger, feeling a surge of magical power.
verbs.examine: The ring's surface is covered in tiny, glowing runes.

itemPrototypes.name: Torch
itemPrototypes.description: A wooden torch with a cloth-wrapped end, ready to be lit for illumination.

verbs.use: You light the torch, casting a warm glow around you.
verbs.examine: The torch is made of sturdy wood with a cloth-wrapped end soaked in flammable oil.
